Pactolus

pactolus PackageÂ¶

Pactolus implements methods for efficient computational identification of metabolites.

pactolus.generate_frag_dag Generate fragmentation trees for molecules.
pactolus.score_frag_dag Score spectra/scans against a collection of molecular fragmentation trees.
pactolus.spectra_distance Compute the fuzzy distance between centroided spectra
  • generate_frag_dag module
  • score_frag_dag module
  • spectra_distance module
